title: E-commerce Platform
description: Full-stack e-commerce solution with admin dashboard, product management, and payment integration
longDescription: A comprehensive e-commerce platform built with modern technologies. Features include real-time inventory management, advanced analytics dashboard, secure payment processing with Stripe, and a fully responsive design. Implemented server-side rendering for optimal SEO performance.

title: Task Management Application
description: Real-time collaborative task manager with drag-and-drop functionality and team collaboration features
longDescription: A powerful task management tool designed for remote teams. Features real-time updates using Socket.io, drag-and-drop Kanban boards, customizable workflows, time tracking, and detailed analytics. Built with a focus on performance and user experience.

title: Data Visualization Dashboard
description: Interactive analytics dashboard with D3.js visualizations for business intelligence and KPI tracking
longDescription: An enterprise-grade analytics dashboard that transforms complex data into actionable insights. Features interactive charts, real-time data updates, customizable KPIs, and export capabilities. Optimized for handling large datasets with efficient rendering.

title: Component Library
description: Reusable React component library with TypeScript, Storybook documentation, and comprehensive testing
longDescription: A production-ready component library that accelerated development across multiple projects. Includes 50+ components, comprehensive documentation with Storybook, accessibility compliance (WCAG), and extensive test coverage with Jest and Playwright.
